com.electronauts.virtualrobot

Class AbstractRobot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.electronauts.virtualrobot.AbstractRobot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TankRobot

    public abstract class AbstractRobot
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The AbstractRobot class provides methods and fields that are common to all forms of robot. The implementation of movement and the number of motors is left to the descendants.
